snippet: Energy companies fell in tandem with the price of oil, and technology companies were down after weak reports from Adobe and HP.
abstract: Stocks fall, weighed down by falling energy and tech shares.
lead_paragraph: Energy companies fell in tandem with the price of oil, and technology companies were down after weak reports from Adobe and HP.

headline.main: Modest Loss for the Market Ahead of British Vote
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall on Energy and Tech Troubles
